hoipolloi
Class Person

java.lang.Object
  hoipolloi.Person
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable
public class Person
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable

The Person Class stores people objects and has methods to send and retrieve their information from the database.

Since:
November 20, 2006
Version:
0.99m December 23, 2007
Author:
Brandon Tanner

public Person(int pid)
       throws EmptyQueryException
Creates a new instance of Person given a Person ID and populates it from the database.

Parameters:
pid - The Person ID
Throws:
Throws - an EmptyQueryException if there is an SQL error or if the PersonID doesn't exist.
EmptyQueryException
Method Detail

compareTo

public int compareTo(java.lang.Object o)

Specified by:
compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Outputs the Person's Full Name including Prefix, First Name, Middle Name, Last Name and Suffix. If any of the parts of their name are blank or null, they are excluded. White space is also trimmed from the beginning and end. Each part is seperated by a space.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
The Full Name of the Person, each part seperated by spaces.

setNewPersonID

private boolean setNewPersonID()
Sets the Person ID of a newly added Person. saveToDatabase() calls this method internally after inserting a new Person into the database. This method sets the Person ID in this object to the ID of that newly added Person.

Returns:
True if Successful, otherwise false.

saveToDatabase

public boolean saveToDatabase()
Saves the contents of this object to the database.

Returns:
True if Successful, Otherwise False.

loadCategoriesFromDB

private boolean loadCategoriesFromDB()
Loads the Categories that this Person is in. When called, the categories list for this person is cleared and the categories that this person is in are reloaded from the database.

Returns:
True if Successful, otherwise false.

loadContactsFromDB

private boolean loadContactsFromDB()
Loads the Contacts for this Person from the Database. When called, the contact list for this person is cleared and the contacts for this person are reloaded from the database.

Returns:
True if Successful, otherwise false.

loadAddressesFromDB

private boolean loadAddressesFromDB()
Loads the Addresses for this Person from the Database. When called, the address list for this person is cleared and the addresses for this person are reloaded from the database.

Returns:
True if Successful, otherwise false.

protected boolean loadFromDatabase()
Load all the information for this Person from the Database.

Returns:

getAgeThisYear

protected long getAgeThisYear()
Gets the Person's Age this Year. Used for showing people with birthdays this month and how old they will be.

Returns:
The Person's Age this Year or -1 if their birthday isn't set.

getCurrentAge

public long getCurrentAge()
Gets the Person's current Age. All times are relative to the user's machine.

Returns:
The Person's Current Age or -1 if the Person's Birthday isn't set.
